Question
========

88% of boys in high schools had a side job during the summer. For girls at the same schools, the percentage is 82%. A researcher takes two random samples: one among boys and the other among girls. Each sample contains 500 students. What is an approximate distribution of the difference between the proportions of these two samples?

Answerlist
----------

* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.017.
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.018.
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.023.
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.035.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.017...: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.018...: Incorrect
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.023...: Correct
* It is a normal distribution with a mean of 0.06 and standard error of 0.035...: Incorrect
